solution_line_template: He has {total_mangoes_kg}-{sold_to_market_kg}= <<{total_mangoes_kg}-{sold_to_market_kg}={remaining_after_market_kg}>>{remaining_after_market_kg} kilograms of mangoes left after selling them to the market.

Colby sold {community_fraction} x {remaining_after_market_kg} = <<{community_fraction}*{remaining_after_market_kg}={sold_to_community_kg}>>{sold_to_community_kg} kilograms of mangoes to the community.
Therefore, Colby still has {actual_remaining_kg}x{mangoes_per_kg}= <<{actual_remaining_kg}*{mangoes_per_kg}={total_mangoes_pieces}>>{total_mangoes_pieces} pieces of mangoes.
